short_description: This interpolates one or more LiDAR tiles using Sibson's natural neighbour method.
help: This interpolates one or more LiDAR tiles using Sibson's natural neighbour method.

parameters.name: Input LiDAR Points
parameters.description: Name of the input LiDAR points (leave blank to use all files in WorkingDirectory.

parameters.name: Point Returns Included
parameters.description: Point return types to include; options are 'all' (default), 'last', 'first'.

parameters.name: Exclusion Classes (0-18, based on LAS spec; e.g. 3,4,5,6,7)
parameters.description: Optional exclude classes from interpolation; Valid class values range from 0 to 18, based on LAS specifications. Example, --exclude_cls='3,4,5,6,7,18'.

parameters.name: Minimum Elevation Value (optional)
parameters.description: Optional minimum elevation for inclusion in interpolation.

parameters.name: Maximum Elevation Value (optional)
parameters.description: Optional maximum elevation for inclusion in interpolation.
